description:
Updated in June 2016!

Over 500 students enrolled!

Find exactly what you need to SUCCEED! With no fluff!

*** 4+ STAR Reviews have been GREAT!***

*********************************************************************************************************

Turn presentations into videos online (for YouTube / Udemy)

This course is about quickly getting your presentations and turning them into videos, and ready for uploading in less than 1 day. It involves simple software that is already on your Mac. I will show you how to prepare videos using different platforms - PowerPoint, Keynote and iMovie.

*********************************************************************************************************

NO NEED to buy special equipment - e.g. cameras, lenses and expensive equipment

NO NEED for lighting and audio recording equipment

*********************************************************************************************************

An EASY-TO-UNDERSTAND, FUN, STEP-BY-STEP course designed just for you:

  1. Beginners who are new to video production and online platforms such as YouTube, Udemy, vimeo etc
  2. Introduce you to Text-to-Speech software (using a good quality voice)

*********************************************************************************************************

INVEST in your FUTURE! Just click "Take This Course" button and you will be on your way to GET STARTED NOW!
title: Express Presentations to Video Fast on a Mac - no equipment
